1_ontology_guided.description: Complete ESGMKG prompt with all guidance

2_baseline_llm.name: Baseline (Unconstrained)
2_baseline_llm.description: Unconstrained LLM (no ontology schema, no SPARQL validation)

entities.label: Semiconductors
entities.description: Semiconductor manufacturing industry within the Technology & Communications sector

entities.label: SASB Sustainability Accounting Standard
entities.description: Sustainability accounting standard for the semiconductors industry

entities.label: Technology & Communications Sector
entities.description: Industry sector classification for technology and communications companies

entities.label: TC-SC
entities.description: Sustainable Industry Classification System code for Semiconductors

entities.label: International Sustainability Standards Board
entities.description: Governing body responsible for stewardship of the standard

entities.label: Version 2023-12
entities.description: December 2023 version of the industry standard

entities.label: SASB Standards
entities.description: Standards intended to aid entities in disclosing information about sustainability-related risks and opportunities that could affect cash flows, access to finance or cost of capital

entities.label: Sustainability-related Risks and Opportunities
entities.description: Risks and opportunities that could reasonably be expected to affect the entity's cash flows, access to finance or cost of capital over short, medium or long term

entities.label: SICS (Sustainable Industry Classification System)
entities.description: Industry classification system used to identify which SASB Standard applies to an entity

entities.label: Semiconductors Industry
entities.description: Industry entities that design or manufacture semiconductor devices, integrated circuits, their raw materials and components, or capital equipment; includes outsourced manufacturing, assembly or other services

entities.label: Disclosure Topics
entities.description: Topics identified as likely to be useful to investors for sustainability reporting

entities.label: Metrics
entities.description: Associated metrics for disclosure topics that entities should consider reporting

entities.label: Cash Flows
entities.description: Financial metric that may be affected by sustainability-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Cost of Capital
entities.description: Financial metric that may be affected by sustainability-related risks and opportunities

entities.label: Gross global Scope 1 emissions
entities.description: Total direct greenhouse gas emissions from owned or controlled sources

entities.label: Perfluorinated compounds emissions
entities.description: Amount of total emissions from perfluorinated compounds

entities.label: Emissions management strategy
entities.description: Long- and short-term strategy or plan to manage Scope 1 emissions, emissions reduction targets, and performance analysis

entities.label: Total energy consumed
entities.description: Total energy consumption in manufacturing operations

entities.label: Percentage grid electricity
entities.description: Percentage of energy from grid electricity

entities.label: Percentage renewable energy
entities.description: Percentage of energy from renewable sources

entities.label: Total water withdrawn
entities.description: Total volume of water withdrawn from all sources

entities.label: Total water consumed
entities.description: Total volume of water consumed

entities.label: Water use in high stress regions
entities.description: Percentage of water withdrawn and consumed in regions with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Hazardous waste from manufacturing
entities.description: Amount of hazardous waste generated from manufacturing operations

entities.label: Percentage waste recycled
entities.description: Percentage of hazardous waste that is recycled

entities.label: Workforce health hazard assessment
entities.description: Description of efforts to assess, monitor, and reduce exposure of workforce to human health hazards

entities.label: Health and safety legal losses
entities.description: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with employee health and safety violations

entities.label: Employees requiring work visa
entities.description: Percentage of employees that require a work visa

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: SASB topic covering GHG emissions management

entities.label: Energy Management in Manufacturing
entities.description: SASB topic covering energy consumption and renewable energy use

entities.label: Water Management
entities.description: SASB topic covering water withdrawal and consumption

entities.label: Waste Management
entities.description: SASB topic covering hazardous waste management

entities.label: Workforce Health & Safety
entities.description: SASB topic covering employee health and safety

entities.label: Recruiting & Managing a Global & Skilled Workforce
entities.description: SASB topic covering workforce recruitment and visa requirements

entities.label: Semiconductors Industry
entities.description: SASB industry classification for semiconductor companies

entities.label: Products containing IEC 62474 declarable substances
entities.description: Percentage of products by revenue that contain IEC 62474 declarable substances

entities.label: Processor energy efficiency
entities.description: Processor energy efficiency at a system-level for: (1) servers, (2) desktops and (3) laptops

entities.label: Critical materials risk management
entities.description: Description of the management of risks associated with the use of critical materials

entities.label: Anti-competitive behaviour monetary losses
entities.description: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with anti-competitive behaviour regulations

entities.label: Total production
entities.description: Total production from own manufacturing facilities and contracted manufacturing services

entities.label: Production from owned facilities
entities.description: Percentage of production from owned facilities

entities.label: Gross global Scope 1 emissions and PFC emissions
entities.description: (1) Gross global Scope 1 emissions and (2) amount of total emissions from perfluorinated compounds

entities.label: Product Lifecycle Management
entities.description: Sustainability topic covering product-related environmental impacts

entities.label: Materials Sourcing
entities.description: Sustainability topic covering critical materials management

entities.label: Intellectual Property Protection & Competitive Behaviour
entities.description: Sustainability topic covering anti-competitive behaviour

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: GHG emissions from semiconductor manufacturing operations, particularly perfluorinated compounds

entities.label: IEC 62474 declarable substances
entities.description: Standard for declarable substances in products

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Protocol
entities.description: Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard for greenhouse gas emissions

entities.label: Seven Kyoto Protocol GHGs
entities.description: CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, and NF3

entities.label: IPCC Fifth Assessment Report
entities.description: Source for global warming potential (GWP) values (2014)

entities.label: SASB Semiconductors Standard
entities.description: Sustainability Accounting Standards Board standard for semiconductor industry

entities.label: Scope 1 Emissions
entities.description: Direct greenhouse gas emissions from sources owned or controlled by the entity, including seven GHGs covered under the Kyoto Protocol

entities.label: Greenhouse Gas Emissions
entities.description: Total emissions of seven greenhouse gases: CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, and NF3

entities.label: Perfluorinated Compound Emissions
entities.description: Scope 1 GHG emissions originating from perfluorinated compounds

entities.label: Emissions Reduction Target
entities.description: Entity's target for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, which may be absolute or intensity-based

entities.label: Total Energy Consumed
entities.description: Total amount of energy consumed in manufacturing operations

entities.label: Grid Electricity Percentage
entities.description: Percentage of total energy from grid electricity

entities.label: Renewable Energy Percentage
entities.description: Percentage of total energy from renewable sources

entities.label: GHG Protocol
entities.description: The Greenhouse Gas Protocol: A Corporate Accounting and Reporting Standard, published by WRI/WBCSD

entities.label: ISO 14064-1
entities.description: International standard for greenhouse gas inventory guidance

entities.label: EPA GHG Inventory Guidance
entities.description: Greenhouse Gas Inventory Guidance for Direct Emissions from Stationary Combustion Sources

entities.label: Semiconductor Industry
entities.description: Industry sector focused on manufacturing semiconductor devices

entities.label: Energy Efficiency
entities.description: Efforts to reduce energy consumption in manufacturing operations

entities.label: SASB TC-SC-110a.2
entities.description: Discussion of long- and short-term strategy to manage Scope 1 emissions and reduction targets

entities.label: SASB TC-SC-130a.1
entities.description: Total energy consumed, percentage grid electricity, and percentage renewable

entities.label: Renewable Energy
entities.description: Renewable fuel consumed, renewable energy directly produced, and renewable energy purchased through PPAs with RECs/GOs

entities.label: Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs)
entities.description: Certificates that must be retained and retired for entity to claim renewable energy

entities.label: Guarantees of Origin (GOs)
entities.description: European certificates that must be retained and retired for entity to claim renewable energy

entities.label: Biomass Renewable Energy
entities.description: Renewable energy from biomass sources certified to third-party standards

entities.label: Total Water Withdrawn
entities.description: Amount of water withdrawn from all sources including surface water, groundwater, rainwater, and municipal supplies

entities.label: Total Water Consumed
entities.description: Water that evaporates, is incorporated into products, or does not return to the same catchment area

entities.label: High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress Regions
entities.description: Regions with high or extremely high baseline water stress where water withdrawal and consumption are measured

entities.label: Ultra-Pure Water
entities.description: Water used for cleaning purposes in semiconductor production to avoid trace molecules affecting product quality

entities.label: Fresh Water
entities.description: Water with less than 1,000 parts per million of dissolved solids

entities.label: Energy Conversion Factors
entities.description: Conversion factors including HHVs for fuel use and kWh to GJ conversions

entities.label: TC-SC-140a.1
entities.description: SASB metric for water withdrawn and consumed in water stress regions

entities.label: Semiconductor Industry
entities.description: Industry requiring significant water volumes for manufacturing and facing water scarcity risks

entities.label: Forest Stewardship Council
entities.description: Third-party standard for certifying biomass materials for renewable energy

entities.label: Green-e Energy
entities.description: Certification program for renewable energy and RECs

entities.label: Water Management
entities.description: Management of water resources in semiconductor operations

entities.label: Water Withdrawn in High Stress Areas
entities.description: Water withdrawn in locations with High (40-80%) or Extremely High (>80%) Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: Water Consumed in High Stress Areas
entities.description: Water consumed in locations with High or Extremely High Baseline Water Stress

entities.label: WRI Water Risk Atlas (Aqueduct)
entities.description: World Resources Institute's tool for classifying baseline water stress

entities.label: Waste Management
entities.description: Management of hazardous waste from semiconductor manufacturing operations

entities.label: Amount of Hazardous Waste
entities.description: Total weight of hazardous waste generated from manufacturing operations

entities.label: Percentage of Hazardous Waste Recycled
entities.description: Percentage of hazardous waste that was recycled, reused, reclaimed or remanufactured

entities.label: TC-SC-150a.1
entities.description: SASB metric code for hazardous waste from manufacturing

entities.label: Semiconductors Industry
entities.description: Industry sector covered by this SASB standard

entities.label: e-Steward Standard
entities.description: Standard for Responsible Recycling and Reuse of Electronic Equipment

entities.label: R2 Standard
entities.description: Responsible Recycling Practices Standard for Electronics Recyclers

entities.label: Energy Recovery
entities.description: Use of combustible waste to generate energy through direct incineration with recovery of heat

entities.label: E-waste
entities.description: Electronic waste transferred to compliant entities

entities.label: Hazardous Waste
entities.description: Waste defined according to Basel Convention or applicable frameworks

entities.label: Recycled Hazardous Waste
entities.description: Hazardous waste that has been recycled

entities.label: Basel Convention
entities.description: UN Environmental Programme framework for defining hazardous waste

entities.label: Workforce Health & Safety
entities.description: Management of worker exposure to health hazards in semiconductor manufacturing

entities.label: Chemical Exposure
entities.description: Worker exposure to hazardous chemicals including solvents, corrosives, lead, arsenic, cadmium, sulphuric acid, carcinogens, teratogens and mutagens

entities.label: TC-SC-320a.1
entities.description: Description of efforts to assess, monitor, and reduce exposure of workforce to human health hazards

entities.label: Workforce
entities.description: Direct employees and contract employees conducting company business

entities.label: Health and Safety Violations
entities.description: Violations resulting in monetary penalties, corrective action costs, and reputational impacts

entities.label: Risk Mitigation Efforts
entities.description: Engineering controls, chemical substitution, risk assessments, monitoring, automation, and protective equipment

entities.label: Monetary losses from health and safety violations
entities.description: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with employee health and safety violations

entities.label: Percentage of employees requiring work visa
entities.description: Percentage of employees that require a work visa in the country in which they are employed

entities.label: Contract Employees
entities.description: Individuals not on the entity's payroll but supervised or managed by the entity, including independent contractors and those employed by third parties

entities.label: Cleanroom Workers
entities.description: Workers in fabrication plants, primary focus for health and safety disclosures

entities.label: Work Visa
entities.description: Non-immigrant visa, permit or documentation issued to permit foreign nationals to work temporarily

entities.label: Workforce Health & Safety
entities.description: Topic covering employee health and safety in semiconductor operations

entities.label: Recruiting & Managing a Global & Skilled Workforce
entities.description: Topic covering recruitment, training, and management of skilled global workforce

entities.label: Legal Proceedings
entities.description: Adjudicative proceedings including court, regulator, arbitrator related to health and safety violations

entities.label: Corrective Actions
entities.description: Changes in operations, management, processes, products, business partners, training or technology in response to legal proceedings

entities.label: Percentage of products by revenue that contain IEC 62474 declarable substances
entities.description: Percentage of products sold during the reporting period that contain declarable substances according to IEC 62474 standard

entities.label: IEC 62474
entities.description: Material Declaration for Products of and for the Electrotechnical Industry - international standard for declarable substances

entities.label: Declarable Substances
entities.description: Substances that must be declared according to IEC 62474 when above reporting threshold, within scope of reporting application, and within mandatory reporting requirement

entities.label: Product Lifecycle Management
entities.description: Management of environmental and human health impacts through energy-efficient products and reduction of harmful materials in semiconductor products

entities.label: Energy Efficiency
entities.description: Energy-efficiency of semiconductor equipment and chips to reduce environmental impact and meet consumer demand

entities.label: Electronic Waste
entities.description: End-of-life management of electronic waste, subject to growing legislative importance

entities.label: Semiconductor Industry
entities.description: Industry covered by SASB Semiconductors Standard (TC-SC)

entities.label: Processor energy efficiency at system-level
entities.description: Energy efficiency of processors based on benchmarked performance per watt of energy consumed for servers, desktops and laptops

entities.label: Server processor energy efficiency
entities.description: Energy efficiency for server processors tested according to SPEC Power SPECpower_sssj2008

entities.label: Desktop processor energy efficiency
entities.description: Energy efficiency for desktop processors tested according to SPEC CPU2006 benchmark

entities.label: Laptop processor energy efficiency
entities.description: Energy efficiency for laptop processors tested according to MobileMark 2014 v1.5
entities.unit: Performance qualification score and Battery life score (minutes)

entities.label: Management of risks associated with critical materials
entities.description: Description of how entity manages risks associated with use of critical materials including physical limits on availability, price changes, and regulatory and reputational risks

entities.label: Critical materials
entities.description: Materials both essential in use and subject to risk of supply restriction, including antimony, cobalt, fluorspar, gallium, germanium, graphite, indium, magnesium, niobium, tantalum, tungsten, platinum group metals, and rare earth elements

entities.label: Product Lifecycle Management
entities.description: Management approaches including product design criteria for substance exclusion, material substitution assessments, and procurement guidelines

entities.label: Materials Sourcing
entities.description: Management of materials sourcing risks including supply disruptions, price volatility, geopolitical uncertainty, and supply chain transparency

entities.label: IEC 62474
entities.description: Reference standard for assessment and management of toxic substances

entities.label: Standard Performance Evaluation Corporation
entities.description: Organization providing benchmarks for server and desktop processor testing

entities.label: MobileMark 2014 v1.5
entities.description: Benchmark for laptop processor energy efficiency testing

entities.label: Rare earth elements
entities.description: Includes yttrium, scandium, lanthanum and lanthanides (cerium, praseodymium, neodymium, promethium, samarium, europium, gadolinium, terbium, dysprosium, holmium, erbium, thulium, ytterbium and lutetium)

entities.label: Platinum group metals
entities.description: Includes platinum, palladium, iridium, rhodium, ruthenium and osmium

entities.label: Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with anti-competitive behaviour regulations
entities.description: Total monetary losses incurred during the reporting period from legal proceedings related to anti-competitive behaviour including price fixing, antitrust behaviour, patent misuse, network effects, and bundling services

entities.label: Intellectual Property Protection & Competitive Behaviour
entities.description: Topic covering IP protection practices, patent rights, licensing terms, and antitrust concerns in the semiconductors industry

entities.label: Anti-competitive Behaviour
entities.description: Behaviours including price fixing, antitrust violations, patent misuse, network effects, and bundling to limit competition

entities.label: Legal Proceedings
entities.description: Adjudicative proceedings before courts, regulators, arbitrators involving anti-competitive behaviour

entities.label: Monetary Losses
entities.description: Monetary liabilities including fines, penalties, disgorgement, restitution from civil actions, regulatory proceedings, and criminal actions

entities.label: Materials Sourcing
entities.description: Topic covering critical materials and associated risks in semiconductor operations

entities.label: Critical Materials
entities.description: Specific materials that present significant risk to semiconductor operations

entities.label: Semiconductors Industry
entities.description: Industry sector covered by SASB standard TC-SC

entities.label: Corrective Actions
entities.description: Actions implemented in response to legal proceedings related to intellectual property protection and competitive behavior

entities.label: Legal Proceedings
entities.description: Legal proceedings related to intellectual property protection and competitive behavior in the semiconductor industry

entities.label: Operations Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in operations as corrective action

entities.label: Management Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in management as corrective action

entities.label: Process Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in processes as corrective action

entities.label: Product Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in products as corrective action

entities.label: Business Partner Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in business partners as corrective action

entities.description: Specific changes in training as corrective action

entities.label: Technology Changes
entities.description: Specific changes in technology as corrective action

entities.label: Intellectual Property Protection & Competitive Behaviour
entities.description: SASB topic covering intellectual property protection and competitive behavior in the semiconductor industry

entities.description: Sustainability Accounting Standards Board standard for the semiconductor industry
